Which post is the right? this one or the prevous? I'm confused




From: Sa=
ndy 
Sent: Monday, February 22, 2010 10:43 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
S=
ubject: Re: Recovering Rodimus/BlackFortress


  
While inside Tucsons' hel=
met, Rat Trap quickly delivers a shot of concentrated Energon via a fine ne=
edle. He knew he had to wake up the Autobot in a hurry, and this was the on=
ly way he knew how.

"Sorry Wheels, gotta do this."

With the injection Tuc=
son gasps for air and comes back online. The jolt is enough to return his e=
nergy levels to a reasonable percentage, but not enough to unfreeze his bod=
y. He could feel Rat Trap in his helmet, yet he sensed that he was a friend=
. He remains quiet.

"And - what the slag do you expect - to get out of me?=
 Ever - hear of the - term, Classified information? Well, that's what my in=
formation is. Classified."

He says in a cold tone of voice to Zarak. His o=
ptics narrow fiercely.
He was not through fighting yet. Rat Trap gathers a =
bit of courage and comes out from inside his helmet.

"Rat Trap Maximize!"
=

He transforms into Maximal form right in front of Zarak.

" That's right l=
izard lips! He don't have ta tell you slag! And know somethn' else?! He's g=
ot more courage than all of you uglies put tagether! He's fightn' this batt=
le all by himself, versus you guys who have ta keep backn' each other up! A=
ND THAT GOES FOR THE FORMER AHEM, NOW ABSCENT RODIMUS PRIME! GAG ME! HE AIN=
'T NEVER GONNA HOLD A CANDLE UP TA OPTIMUS PRIME, EVER!"

Tucson gasps.

"R=
at - Trap, be - careful."

Rat Trap grunts.

" It's true wheels! If anyone =
should lead the Autobots, it's you! You got the heart, the spark, the coura=
ge, the strength, the compassion, and the will ta fight! No matter what cam=
e down the pike! "

Tucson sighs.

"My - name is Tucson."

Rat Trap now sta=
nds in front of Tucson.

"Not for long it ain't gonna be. You got the spark=
 of Optimus Prime, you're it, you're the bot! EAT THIS RODDIE! LONG LIVE TU=
CSON PRIME!"

Tucson gasps again in shock.

"Rat Trap, please, watch your w=
ords."

Rat Trap shrugs.

"Couldn't help myself, I got a big mouth for a li=
ttle rat."

 piece of information that
> >coudl be usefull, even if that means to use p=
ainful means; when you have a good

ke the matrix...
> 
> (SNIP)
> 
> Zarak straightened, crossing his arms ove=
r his chest as he coolly looked at Perceptor. "Of course" he said, the look=
 on his face a cold blank mask, revealing nothing of the inner turmoil he w=
as dealing with. There was a part of him that wanted to blast the little Pr=
edacon for daring to tell him anything. But the ugly thing was that Zarak s=
till needed the extra forces that Hydras and his Predacons brought to the t=
able.
> 
> So rather than commanding his Scorponok unit to open fire on the=
 base he just nodded and said, "I apologize, I have overstepped my place."
=
> 
> Meanwhile Cyclonus and Scourge continued to face down Dark Rodimus, th=
e air was tense as Dark Rodimus' optics stared into Cyclonus, niether of th=
em ready to back down, both of them remembering the last battle they fought=
!
> 
> However it was Perceptor that broke the deadlock as he continued giv=
ing orders . . . 
> 
> (PASTE)
> 
> > The rest, we have to Keep an eye in m=
aximal base things are becoming
> > interesting lately there, Rodimus... I =
need you for task"
> 
> The affect of the command was almost instant as Rod=
imus stepped back from Cyclonus and Scourge and looked over at Perceptor. "=
What'cha need Percy?" Rodimus said to Perceptor, happy for the moment that =
it was Perceptor and Hydras giving orders and not Cyclonus and his lap dog.=

> 
> Cyclonus, seeing the break in the tension also stepped back, pulling =
Scourge back with him. "There will be another time Scourge." he said quietl=
y, "No need to fight this out here."
> 
> Scourge nodded, "Yes, there will =
be." he said darkly. His optics still watched Rodimus, his look almost hung=
ry as he smiled evilly.
> 
> As the tensions between Cyclonus, Scourge and =
Rodimus cooled Zarak turned to look at Tuscon, wondering what information t=
his bot could hold. "Come" Zarak said to Darkhawk, "Let's see what this Aut=
o . . . "
> 
> *BEEP*
> 
> Zarak was caught in mid sentence by his scanner =
going off, the hand held one that he had been keeping trained on Tuscon. He=
 glanced down at it, a curious look on his face. For some reason it was reg=
istering a life sign where there had been none before. It was located somew=
here near Tuscon's head.
> 
> Zarak stepped forward to take a more careful =
scan . . .
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> OOC: Yup, the same scanner he had been scanning =
him with a few posts ago. It is still out and processing :) 
>
